description: Creditbit is a PoW/PoS cryptocurrency which uses X11 as its hashing algorithm during the PoW stage. During the PoS stage, users may earn up to 8% by staking their coins. Creditbit has a 1 minute block time, which is  10 times faster than Bitcoin. Creditbit has a minimum stake time of 24 hours and a maximum stake time of one year.
name: Creditbit
